data.actual_result: Whilst uploading the file the message is in cozy display ()
data.expected_result: Message showing upload progress/details is in compact mode (matches settings)
data.short_description: File uploading message uses cozy display in compact mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Set Message Display to Compact (User Settings > Appearance > Message Display) - Go to text channel - Upload a file - Observe
